result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Throw/Discharge Bodily Fluid at Public Safety Worker or Prosecutor

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sandra Nicole Lee

records.addlTxt: Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Discharge Report 11.2.22
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Violation Report 6.21.2022

Defendant Sandra Nicole Lee in court.  Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court for Sandra Nicole Lee.  Attorney Stephanie Krueger in court for State of Wisconsin. Sworn as interpreters:  Kate Block and Sarah Voelker. 
Case in court for return on doctor's report.  Defendant missed her NGI evaluation.  Court rescheduled evaluation.  NGI evaluation will take place the Wisconsin Forensic Unit, Room 504 of the Safety Building with Dr. Jenna Goebel on October 28, 2022 at 10:00 am. Case adjourned to Branch 40.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for November 15, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Received and Filed:  Letter from examining doctor.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Violation Report 9.30.22
Signed and Filed:  Order for NGI Examination

Defendant Sandra Nicole Lee not in court, in custody.  Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court for Sandra Nicole Lee.  Attorney Stephanie Krueger in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for return on warrant.  Arguments heard as to bail.  Court does not make any changes to bail.  $500 signature bond previously set remains in effect.  Court rescheduled NGI examination and return on doctor's report hearing.  Order signed and filed. Case adjourned to Branch 40.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Return on warrant on September 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Bench warrant cleared by Milwaukee County Sheriff on September 1, 2022.  Original bench warrant scanned.  Case is adjourned until September 6, 2022 at 08:30am for Return on Bench Warrant in Branch 40, Rm 634 CH.  Notice is given to Defense Attorney and District Attorney.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court.  Stephanie Krueger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for Doctor's Report Return. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued forthwith. COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court takes no action on bail.
Received and Filed: Discharge Report 8.1.22
Received and Filed: Violation_Report_7.27.22
Received and Filed:  Letter from examining doctor addressed to the Court.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Violation Report 7.22.22
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Violation Report 7.5.22
Pretrial Release Conditions Order, received and filed.
Signed and filed: Order for Examination
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for level 5 SUPERVISION.

Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant enters a special plea of not guilty by reason of mental defect.  NGI evaluation scheduled.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.   NGI evaluation will take place the Wisconsin Forensic Unit, Room 504 of the Safety Building with Dr. Jenna Goebel on July 20, 2022 at 11:00 AM. Case remains calendared in Branch 40.

Defendant Sandra Nicole Lee in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Sandra Nicole Lee in custody.  Stephanie Krueger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a return on Doctor's report.  Court is in receipt of Dr's report dated 06-23-2022.  Parties do not contest the report.   Court finds the defendant is competent to proceed and reinstates the proceedings.  Initial appearance proceeded.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Waiver of preliminary hearing proceeded.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed:  Dr. Report Dated June 23, 2022
Received and Filed: Attorney Stephen Sargent
Forensic evaluation ordered.  INITIAL APPEARANCE NOT HELD.  Trial court to address INITIAL APPEARANCE.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Sandra Nicole Lee not in court, in custody.  Atty Sargent waived Defendant's appearance.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means for .  Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause and ordered defendant examined by the Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40.   Court ordered defendant REMANDED into custody of Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Commissioner tolls the time limits for the preliminary hearing.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/a8cc2343-9b62-c309-778f-fa846faecb6a.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for June 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Order for Competency Examination, signed and filed.
